title: PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working error, tried EVERYTHING and it wont work, I'm desperate.
body:
So this error popped up today for the first time, I never had problems like that but no matter what I do it wont help. I uninstalled League completely and tried to download it again and it still wont fix it.

I ran the launcher as an admin and it still wont fix it.

I am clueless, please, someone help me.


ERROR: https://gyazo.com/8e098b276ffca5ec2822864d73af434c

replies.body: This kernel error is usually a result of a security setting with your OS or software that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Try the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being added as an exception.  Let me know if you've got any questions!
